text: Brucea is a genus of plant in the family Simaroubaceae. It is named for the Scottish scholar and explorer James Bruce. It contains the following species (this list may be incomplete): * Brucea antidysenterica * Brucea bruceadelpha * Brucea erythraeae * Brucea guineensis * Brucea javanica * Brucea macrocarpa * Brucea mollis * Brucea tenuifolia * Brucea tonkinensis * Brucea trichotoma ==References== Category:Sapindales genera Category:Taxa named by John Frederick Miller Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Brucea
